page.title: 12WEST WITTERING FARMS
page.content: Most of the farmland in this block is used for growing crops but some livestock is kept. {Nunnington Farm.}The owner of Nunnington Farm is Mr.Broadbridge and his family live in the farm house.He farms 175 acres of land in this block. He uses a variety of mechanised equipment,including a JCB,six tractors and a combine harvester.They grow horse beans,barley oats,corn and wheat and some fields are left as grass for the sheep.At present there are no livestock on the farm but Mr.Broadbridge hopes to reintroduce some sheep back onto his land in July. There are also four silos and several barns on the farm to store silage and hay for the Winter months.
